articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves for Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves for Egypt
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday left here to attend in the 15th summit of non-aligned countries to be held in Egypt.
					 He was seen off at the airport by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the SPA, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, the Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK and the charge d'affaires ad interim of China.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Sao Tome and Principe
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Sao Tome and Principe
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Frederique de Menezes, President of the Democratic Republic of Sao Tome and Principe, on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the independence of the country and the proclamation of the republic.
					 Kim in the message wished the president and the people of Sao Tome and Principe greater success in their work for peace of the country and national unity and economic prosperity.

articles.title: Anniversary of Conclusion of DPRK-China Treaty Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Conclusion of DPRK-China Treaty Observed
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A reception was co-arranged by the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association at the Okryu Restaurant Friday on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of the conclusion of the DPRK-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance.
					 Present there on invitation were Hao Xiaofei, Chinese charge d affaires ad interim here, and staff members of her embassy.
					
					 Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health who is chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, said in his speech that President Kim Il Sung and Premier Zhou Enlai signed the above-said treaty 48 years ago, adding that the two countries have steadily boosted the friendly and cooperative relations, supporting each other guided by the spirit of the treaty.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are growing stronger day by day, he said he would make efforts to boost the friendly relations in the future, too.
					
					 He wished the Chinese people greater success in their work for significantly celebrating the 60th anniversary of the People's Republic of China.
					
					 The Chinese charge d affaires a.i. said in her speech that the two countries have achieved successes in the political, economic and cultural and various other fields, respecting and closely cooperating with each other in the spirit of the treaty for the past 48 years. 
					
					 She recalled that the two countries have held colorful friendly events, noting that this year marks the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries and is celebrated as a "year of Sino-DPRK Friendship."
					
					 It is the consistent policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily boost the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, she said, declaring that China would steadily advance the Sino-DPRK good neighborly and friendly relations.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-China Treaty Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-China Treaty Marked
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on July 9 on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of the conclusion of the DPRK-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance.
					 Present there on invitation were the vice-chairperson of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Hu Zhengyue, assistant to the foreign minister, others and officials concerned of China.
					
					 Ambassador Choe Jin Su and staff members of the DPRK embassy in China were on hand.
					
					 Choe Jin Su noted in his speech that President Kim Il Sung together with Premier Zhou Enlai signed the DPRK-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance, saying it was an important event that recorded a brilliant chapter in the history of DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 It is the consistent policy of the Korean party and government to steadily consolidate and develop DPRK-China friendship, he said, expressing the conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop onto a new higher stage in the "year of DPRK-China friendship" marking the 60th anniversary of the establishment of bilateral diplomatic ties.
					
					 The vice-chairperson of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference said that both sides have made positive contribution to promoting the development of each side and defending the regional peace and stability by briskly conducting their exchange and cooperation in various fields, including politics, economy and culture, in the spirit of the treaty.
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to continuously consolidate and develop the traditional China-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation, he said, declaring that the Chinese side, together with the DPRK side, will further develop the relations between the two countries by strengthening exchange and cooperation in various fields with the "year of China-DPRK friendship" as an occasion.

articles.title: Foreigners Here
articles.content:
Foreigners Here
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troupe of Russia Named after N.S. Nadezhdina led by its Head Mira Koltsova came here on Saturday.
					 Also arriving was a delegation of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association headed by Chairman Mamoru Kitahara.

articles.title: New Map of Main Flyways of Migratory Birds Staying in Korea Made
articles.content:
New Map of Main Flyways of Migratory Birds Staying in Korea Made
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Zoology Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences has recently produced a new map of main flyways of migratory birds staying in Korea.
					 Communicable diseases by animal pathogen are steadily expanding over the world and especially migratory birds moving from region to region and from country to country are a major carrier of epidemic pathogen.
					
					 Korea is on main route of migratory birds moving between East Asia and Oceania.
					
					 They have traveled all parts of the country including Rason, Wonsan, Thongchon and other areas on the east coast and basins of Amnok, Chongchon, Taedong and Rimjin rivers and other areas on the west coast to make the map of flyways reflecting in detail the staying period, place, species and numbers of migratory birds.
					
					 The new map, which enables the readers easily to see the flyways of migrants staying in Korea such as wild geese, swans and snipes, will be helpful to preventing epidemic diseases by animal pathogen and taking scientific prophylactic measures.

articles.title: Many People Visit Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Many People Visit Phophyong Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of working people from different walks of life and school youth and children is flowing to the Phophyong Revolutionary Site on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter.
					 The site is a significant place where Kim Hyong Jik conducted revolutionary activities from Juche 10 (1921) to Juche 13 (1924), frequently crossing the River Amnok from Badaogou of China.
					
					 Staying there he gave guidance to the meeting for inaugurating the Phophyong Branch of the Korean National Association and the activities of revolutionaries in homeland, had talks with those coming to the Phophyong Church and taught revolutionary and patriotic songs to young people.
					
					 The site consists of the Phophyong Post Office and the Phophyong Noodle Shop associated with Kim Hyong Jik's revolutionary activities, Tokphanmit house and a spring where he gave medical treatment to people and educated them in the anti-Japanese patriotic idea and the progressive idea, and others.
					
					 Also there is the Phophyong Police Post where he led a prison life after being arrested by the Japanese imperialists on a tip-off of their stooge.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Korean People's Fidelity to Kim Il Sung's Idea and Cause
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Korean People's Fidelity to Kim Il Sung's Idea and Cause
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung are sure to always triumph as the revolutionary army and people enshrine their loyalty to him as their faith and conscience, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 The past 15 years were a glorious period in which the great traits of perfect unity between the President and the people were displayed at the highest level and the invincibility of the idea and cause of the President was demonstrated to the whole world, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary traits of the Korean people upholding the idea and cause of the President with loyalty find their manifestation in that they are translating the President's intention and desire into a brilliant reality, glorifying his glorious revolutionary history and revolutionary exploits as treasures of eternal value, invariably holding aloft the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The Korean people live and struggle as required by the Juche idea, considering it as immutable truth and motto of their life and struggle. The Korean people's struggle to more thoroughly arm themselves with the Songun idea based on the Juche idea is steadily gaining in scope and strength and the work of modeling the whole society on the monolithic idea has been put on a new higher stage and the revolutionary ranks have grown to be an unbreakable integral whole in terms of thinking and will in this course.
					
					 They regard it as the noblest moral obligation and revolutionary duty as soldiers and disciples of the President to glorify his sacred revolutionary history and revolutionary exploits. The Songun revolutionary leadership exploits performed by the President have become an eternal cornerstone of the WPK and the revolution and all the work related to socialist construction including party-building, army-building and nation-building is being carried out as taught by the President.
					
					 The lifetime intention and desire of the President have been translated into a brilliant reality, ushering in the new era of national prosperity. This is a shining reality of the country today.
					
					 Today the Korean people are making an all-out charge to fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation at any cost in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President. The spirit of great innovation and great leap forward prevails in all parts of the country thanks to the high revolutionary zeal of all the servicepersons and people to glorify the present great revolutionary surge as a great surge for final victory.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Hold Fast to Three Principles of National Reunification
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Hold Fast to Three Principles of National Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The three principles of national reunification always serve as an immortal reunification charter common to the Korean nation and unshakable guidelines to be consistently maintained and implemented by the Koreans in the reunification movement. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The three principles --independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity-- laid down by President Kim Il Sung are the cornerstone of national reunification as they clarify the fundamental stand and ways to settle the issue of the reunification of the country in conformity with the will and interests of the Koreans by their concerted efforts. 
					
					 The movement for national reunification has made progress in the direction of great national unity on the principle of national independence. This is ascribable to the fact that the Koreans have waged a struggle, firmly adhering to the above-said principles. 
					
					 The historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration are based on the above-mentioned principles. These principles are also embodied in the idea of "By our nation itself" which is giving rise to the hot wind of independent reunification and national cooperation amidst the support and sympathy of the whole nation. 
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification in which the future of peace and reunification is being carved out by the concerted efforts of the Koreans while rejecting foreign forces would be unthinkable without abiding by the three principles. 
					
					 The Koreans have keenly realized the truth and vitality of the three principles in the course of dynamically advancing the movement for national reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, shining embodiment of the three principles.
					
					 The said three principles are the most just and realistic reunification charter common to the nation to be unanimously adhered to by the whole nation. The three principles serve as an immutable banner of national reunification to be always held aloft by the Koreans as they reflect the President's noble idea and line of independent reunification and his patriotic intention and indicate most correct principles and ways for developing the reunification movement, concludes the article.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression of Reunification Movement Organizations under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression of Reunification Movement Organizations under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on July 4 in denunciation of traitor Lee Myung Bak group's fascist suppression of the members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 Saying that the brutal suppression of the headquarters is an anti-reunification act of denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and blocking national reconciliation and unity and another dangerous provocation to fellow countrymen, the statement vehemently denounced the suppression. 
					
					 The statement accused the group of cooking up "cases of violation of the National Security Law" recently in a bid to incite the consciousness of confrontation with the DPRK among the south Korean people and further strengthen its fascist dictatorial system.
					
					 The statement urged the group to put an immediate end to the fascist suppression of the reunification movement organizations and release the illegally detained members as early as possible, bearing in mind that its intensified fascist suppression and confrontation with fellow countrymen would only precipitate its own self-destruction.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Wild Act Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Wild Act Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The People's Council for People's Livelihood and Democracy, the All-People Measure Committee against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan and other civic and public organizations in south Korea jointly called a press conference in Seoul on July 7 and denounced traitor Lee Myung Bak for seeking to nominate Chon Song Gwan keen on fascist repression and confrontation with fellow countrymen as puppet public prosecutor general.
					 Speakers at the conference charged that Chon, informally nominated as public prosecutor general, has concealed the truth of Ryongsan incident while defending policemen and gangsters who killed evacuees in Ryongsan.
					
					 He has not only harshly persecuted pro-reunification movement organizations including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and executed a lot of people after faking up all sorts of "spy cases" but also engaged himself in all kinds of corruption and irregularities including the speculative dealing of real estate, bribery and swindling, they pointed out.
					
					 They contended that Lee's informal nomination of this guy as public prosecutor general is little short of declaring that he would not change the present "state administration."

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting Held in Finland
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting Held in Finland
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of political parties and organizations of Finland took place in Helsinki on July 4 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Antti Sika-Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, said in his speech that the President was a distinguished thinker and theoretician and an invincible and iron-willed commander and a great revolutionary who devoted his whole life to the Korean revolution and the world revolution. 
					
					 The President made long journeys for devoted service to people to mix with them and share weal and woe with them at all times and overcame difficulties and hardships before them by enlisting their inexhaustible creative energy, he noted.
					
					 The Juche idea is serving as a powerful ideological and moral weapon for the progressive people of the world at present when a more dynamic struggle for independence is going on, he noted, adding that the friends of the DPRK in Finland would express full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle in the future, too.
					
					 Saying that they always bear deep in their minds the slogan "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us", he prayed for the immortality of the President. 
					
					A message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Foreign Political Parties
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Dominican New Line Party, the Dominican Working Force's Party, the Dominican Socialist Line Party, the Dominican Communist Party (Marxism-Leninism) and the Dominican Workers' Party issued a joint statement on June 29 in support of the Korean people's cause of defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country. 
					 The statement bitterly denounced the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys for making desperate efforts to break the will of the heroic Korean people and subjugate them. 
					
					 The revolutionary people of the world including the Dominican people are following the resolute struggle of the Korean people to firmly protect the dignity of their country with deep respect, it noted.
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK will continue to make a long drive, the statement said, voicing full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just struggle.
					
					 The Pribram County Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia issued a statement on June 30 on the occasion of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people. It expressed full support to the Korean people's struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country according to the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan national preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated with due ceremony on July 1.
					 Anura Pnyadar Shana Yapa, minister of Mass Information and chairman of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					 It discussed the issue of widely holding colorful events including a meeting, seminar and photo exhibition praising the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung in the human cause of independence on the occasion of the centenary of birth of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" was brought out in booklet by the International Institute of the Juche Idea on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), said that Kimilsungia is a flower of sun symbolic of the greatness of the President who indicated the road ahead of the world people and a flower praising the great man now in full bloom in the hearts of humankind in the era of independence and that the Korean people are greatly proud and honored to have the immortal flower, a national treasure, shining with the august name of the President.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place in India on July 4.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam hacia Egipto para la XV Cumbre de NOAL
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam hacia Egipto para la XV Cumbre de NOAL
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ATCC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea partio hoy de esta capital para participar en la XV Cumbre de los Paises No Alineados a efectuarse en Egipto.
					En el aeropuerto Kim fue despedido por el vicepresidente del Presidum de la APS de la RPDC Yang Hyong Sop y el vicecanciller coreano Kim Hyong Jun, el embajador de Egipto y el encargado de negocios a.i de China, acreditados en Corea.

articles.title: Elaborado mapa de rutas principales de aves migratorias
articles.content:
Elaborado mapa de rutas principales de aves migratorias
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ATCC) -- Ultimamente, los cientificos del Instituto de Zoologia de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias elaboraron el nuevo mapa de las rutas principales de las aves migratorias que pasan algun tiempo en Corea.
					  Ahora, crecen cada dia mas en el ambito mundial los danos ocasionados por las epidemias brotadas por los agentes patogenos animales.
					
					Sobre todo, las aves que viajan entre las regiones y los paises son uno de los principales genes transmisores.
					
					  Corea es uno de los principales puntos de escala de los pajaros que se trasladan desde Asia Oriental hasta la Oceania.
					
					  Los zoologos de la entidad mencionada confeccionaron el mapa aclarando en detalles el periodo y el lugar de estancia, las especies, el numero de las aves migratorias a base de los datos que recogieron en su periplo por diferentes localidades del pais como la zona costera del Mar Este como Rason, Wonsan y Thongchon y la zona litoral del Mar Oeste como los rios Amnok, Chongchon, las corrientes abajo de los rios Taedong y Rimjin.
					
					  El nuevo mapa contribuira a conocer facilmente el itinerario de traslado de las aves de paso en Corea como las variedades de ganso silvestre, cisne y rayuelo.
					
					Igualmente, es muy util para prevenir consecuentemente los danos de las epidemias que se difunden por los agentes patogenos animales y tomar medidas preventivas mas cientificas.

articles.title: Se incrementan visitantes al lugar historico-revolucionario de Phophyong
articles.content:
Se incrementan visitantes al lugar historico-revolucionario de Phophyong
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ATCC) -- En ocasion del dia de nacimiento del indoblegable combatiente revolucionario Kim Hyong Jik, los trabajadores de distintos estratos, los jovenes y ninos escolares visitan de continuo el Lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Phophyong. 
					Del ano 10 (1921) de la Era Juche al 13 (1924) de la Era Juche, Kim Hyong Jik libro actividades revolucionarias en esta zona cruzando con frecuencia el rio Amnok desde Badaogou de China.
					
					Kim dirigio la constitucion de la sucursal de la Asociacion Nacional Coreana en Phophyong y las actividades de los revolucionarios del pais, compartio charlas con las personas que venian a la iglesia de Phophyong para hacer la misa y enseno las canciones revolucionarias y patrioticas a los jovenes.
					
					En este lugar historico se ven la casa consignadora de correos de Phophyong, el restaurante de fideos de Phophyong, el manantial y una casa bajo la meseta donde Kim curo a los habitantes y les educo en la idea patriotica antijaponesa y las ideas avanzadas. 
					
					Ademas, se conserva la estacion de policia donde el sufrio la prision por la delacion de un lacayo de los imperialistas japoneses.

articles.title: Pueblo coreano apoya con fidelidad la idea y causa de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Pueblo coreano apoya con fidelidad la idea y causa de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ATCC) -- Gracias al ejercito y el pueblo revolucionarios que guardan en el corazon la fidelidad al Lider como confianza y conciencia, son eternamente invencibles la idea y la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					  Los ultimos 15 anos fueron los dias sagrados en que los grandes rasgos de la unidad monolitica entre el Lider padre y el pueblo florecieron en el mas noble nivel y la invencibilidad de la ideologia y la causa del  Presidente se manifesto a todo el mundo.
					
					  El rasgo revolucionario del pueblo coreano que apoya fielmente la idea y la causa del Lider se pone de pleno manifiesto en el sentido de hacer brillar como herencia eterna la gloriosa historia revolucionaria y las hazanas revolucionarias de este y hacer florecer plenamente su proposito y deseo enarbolando invariablemente la bandera de la idea Juche.
					
					  Ahora, el pueblo coreano toma la idea Juche por la veracidad absoluta y la maxima de la vida y lucha  viviendo y luchando segun su demanda.  
					
					  Especialmente se profundiza continuamente la lucha por armarse con mas firmeza con la idea Juche y la del Songun (priorizacion militar) que echa sus raices en aquella. En este proceso la identificacion ideologica de toda la sociedad se puso en nueva y alta etapa y nuestras filas revolucionarias se consolidan como inquebrantable cuerpo unido de idea y voluntad.
					
					  Hoy en dia, para el pueblo coreano, hacer brillar su sagrada historia revolucionaria y hazanas revolucionarias sirve de la mas noble obligacion moral y del deber revolucionario del soldado y discipulo del Lider
					
					  Tambien las hazanas del gran Lider en la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun constituyen la eterna piedra angular del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion coreana y todas las labores de la construccion socialista como la del partido, la del ejercito y la del Estado se realizan segun instrucciones del lider.
					
					  Hoy, en nuestra patria se realizan el proposito y la aspiracion del Presidente y se abre la nueva epoca de la prosperidad nacional sobre esta tierra.
					
					  Ahora el pueblo coreano hace ingentes esfuerzos  por abrir, cueste lo que cueste, las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en el ano 2012 en que se cumplira el centenario del nacimiento del Presidente.
					
					  En virtud del elevado celo revolucionario de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo de hacer del gran auge revolucionario de hoy el de victoria final, predomina en todo el pais el temperamento de la gran innovacion y del gran salto.
